name: Serperior
description: The Regal Pokémon. They raise their heads to intimidate opponents but only give it their all when fighting a powerful opponent.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.description: Moves that affect this Pokémon's stats have the opposite effect. (For example, Defense Curl would lower AC by 4. Growl would increase its attack by +1)
